name: @oi4/oi4registry
description: A registry that keeps track of all running Open Industry 4.0 Alliance application
author: Open Industry 4.0 Alliance - Community

scripts.testLocalUI: echo "Check your browser for port 5000" && npx serve packages/oi4-local-ui/build -s
scripts.docker:build: yarn run prepareContainer && docker buildx build --push --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7,linux/arm/v6 -t ghcr.io/oi4/oi4-oec-registry:${npm_package_version} .
scripts.docker:build:local: yarn run prepareContainer && docker build -t oi4/oi4-oec-registry:${npm_package_version} -t oi4/oi4-oec-registry:latest .
scripts.docker:build:snapshot: yarn run prepareContainer && docker build -t oi4/oi4-oec-registry:${npm_package_version} -t oi4/oi4-oec-registry:latest --build-arg BUILD_ENV=snapshot .
scripts.buildAll: cd ./packages/oi4-local-ui && npm run build && cd ../packages/oi4-registry-service && npm run tsc && cd ..
scripts.installAll: cd ./packages/oi4-local-ui && npm install && cd ../oi4-registry-service && npm install && cd ..
